Login / Register

Night Navigation for runners and walkers

Friday 19th November 2021

ENTER ONLINE
Entries Open
Tuesday 7th September 2021
Entries Close
Saturday 13th November 2021
Entry Fees
Entry Fee   £40.00   
Contact
Jamie Glazebrook
Email
hello@firstlightactive.com
Website
https://firstlightactive.com/

To enter you must first Log In or Register your Details with SiEntries.

An immersive session (18:00 - 22:00) of getting to grips with the fundamentals of night / poor visibility navigation and putting them into use. You will learn:

  • Compass bearings and moving on bearings
  • Pacing
  • Locating / relocating yourself on the map using the clues around you
  • Following a route (micronavigation principles)
  • Developing a calm and rational mindset and trusting your map and compass.

Plus many other tips and tricks.

The course will take place entirely outdoors on the Eastern Moors (Peak District) South West of Sheffield. Exact location will be communicated the week before (depending on local ground conditions).

This will be a complementary mix of theory / practical training so ensure you are wearing suitable clothing / footwear relative to the conditions and moving over uneven terrain...in the dark! We will be moving at a walking pace rather than running.

If you have your own compass bring it along. If not we do have some you can borrow.
